title: Solidity Writing TokenBank
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Write a TokenBank contract that can deposit [your own Token](https://decert.me/quests/aa45f136-27a3-4bc9-b4f7-15308e1e0daa) into TokenBank and withdraw from TokenBank.

TokenBank has two methods:
1. deposit(): needs to record the deposit amount for each address;
2. withdraw(): users can withdraw their previously deposited tokens.

Enter your code or github link in the answer box.

description: This challenge is used to understand the interaction between contracts, understand the use of ERC20, especially the transfer of Tokens, and the combined use of approve and transferFrom.
